Posts.Content: Susan-stage-4 wrote: I'm stage 4 breast cancer with metastasizes to my skull. Two years ago the removed a two inch in diameter piece of my skull to take out a tumour. All has gone well since, until I started having weird twinges and pains. Tumour markers have gone up "a bit". Whatever that means. Now I'm waiting for the call with my appointment times. I've done everything right. I completely changed my life. Everything from my job to my diet. I even have an organic vegetable garden where before I store bought and microwaved. I hate the waiting and not knowing. And I hate the smug confidence of my onco who originally said one to six years. Help Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Skull or brain activity? Susan-stage-4 thats-life-
